net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Util_modifySaveDamage
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Calculate the amount of damage for a specific save result

arg(1) = Damage applied if save fails
arg(0) = Save result with one of these values
half
Divide the total in half, minimum of one
none
Damage returned is 0
number
Multiply the damage by the passed number, minimum of one
failed
Return the damage passed without change


Return an object with the modified damage and a string showing the effect applied
  {
    "damage": Modified damage
    "saveText": String describing what was done
  }
